alert.note: Alert for McDonald (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 5:05PM CDT until July 27 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern McDonald County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 505 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hiwasse, or near Bella Vista, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern McDonald County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
